about_the_game:
Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike horde arena survival game with top-notch graphics. In this demo, you choose one of the damned heroes and attempt to pass the gods' test by fighting your way out of the Norse underworld, Helheim.

If you succeed in all the trials, you will become the chosen Jotunslayer.

GAME FEATURES

Fast-paced battles against hordes of enemies

In adrenaline-fueled battles against endless waves of enemies, strive to summon the final boss to successfully complete the gods' trial and earn greater rewards. To achieve this, you'll need to complete a series of missions, not just survive individual runs.

Pursue in-run missions for added challenges

Accomplish challenging missions within each run to test your abilities and add depth to your journey through Nine worlds. These quests may require you to complete specific objectives or overcome additional obstacles for greater rewards and favor of Norse Gods.

Experience meta-progression with unlockable perks

Progress and improve your character with meta-progression systems that offer unlockable perks and upgrades. As you continue to upgrade, you'll unlock new abilities, enhancements, and bonuses to customize your playstyle and enhance your chances of survival and become ultimate Odin’s warrior, the Jotunslayer.

Customize gameplay with diverse characters for endless combinations
In this demo, Choose from two playable characters, each with their own unique set of skills, abilities, and weapons. Experiment with different combinations to find the perfect build and adapt to various challenges encountered throughout the Hordes of Hel.

Face escalating boss threats while utilizing kiting tactics to destruct enemies

Confront Boss enemies that pose increasing levels of threat as you progress through the game. Outmaneuver and defeat these formidable foes, utilizing the environment and your skills to gain the upper hand and emerge victorious.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains mainly fantasy violence against non-human enemies such as skeletons or other fantasy monsters, but the effects of violence are also visible on human heroes, such as scars or wounds and traces of blood.

short_description: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike horde-survivor game set in the dark realms of Norse Mythology. Fight waves of enemies to earn divine blessings of ancient Viking Deities, explore hostile worlds and face powerful bosses. Become a god-like warrior in this ultimate showdown.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Slovak
